name: Three-Rum Old Fashioned
description: Mike Treffehn of The Franklin Mortgage & Investment Co. in Philadelphia shared this tiki-style drink recipe. It brings out the best in three rums with their own strong personalities.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass 2/3 full with ice. Add Appleton, Ron Zacapa, Smith and Cross rum, rich demerara syrup, Angostura and mole bitters. Stir until very cold, about 30 seconds.
Fill a rocks glass with fresh ice. Strain cocktail onto ice, garnish with orange twist, and serve.
